sentences.en: Advances the housing commercialization, starts two levels of markets.
sentences.cn: 推进住房商品化, 启动二级市场.

sentences.en: Another thing that concerns me is the commercialization of every aspect of our lives.
sentences.cn: 另一件令我担心的事是我们生存的环境中充满了商业化。

sentences.en: Both companies will retain control over the commercialization of their own products.
sentences.cn: 两家公司都将保留对各自产品商业化的控制.

sentences.en: First commercialization application just is knitted make sock and parachute.
sentences.cn: 最初的商品化应用只是织制袜子和降落伞.

sentences.en: Full - scale commercialization of high - temperature cells will not be possible.
sentences.cn: 全面应用高温电池是不可能的.

sentences.en: Hardly anyone can escape the influence of commercialization.
sentences.cn: 几乎没有人能逃脱商品化的影响。

sentences.en: However, the commercialization of polyfluorenes has been hampered by the bad color purity.
sentences.cn: 然而, 色纯度差的问题一直制约着此类材料商品化的实现.

sentences.en: In the context of ethnic tourism, commercialization often has a pejorative connotation.
sentences.cn: 摘要在民族旅游语境中, 商品化经常带有贬义色彩.

sentences.en: Is Commercialization an effective means to promote small loans?
sentences.cn: “商业化”真的是小额信贷的出路 吗 ?

sentences.en: It includes commercialization of generic software and software for both.
sentences.cn: 它包括商品化的通用软件和专用软件两种.

sentences.en: Made car of cell of abundant cropland fuel achieves commercialization 2003.
sentences.cn: 2003年使丰田燃料电池车达到商品化.

sentences.en: Many programmers are unhappy about the commercialization of system software.
sentences.cn: 许多程序员对系统软件的商业化感到不悦.

sentences.en: State - owned city grain shop as commissariat commercialization.
sentences.cn: 国有 城市粮店随着粮食商品化.

sentences.en: Technocal innovation is the whole process from invention - creation to commercialization of technical.
sentences.cn: 技术创新是从发明创造到科技成果实现商业化的过程.

sentences.en: The technology is very new, but it is moving fast to commercialization.
sentences.cn: 这个技术很新, 但是商业化的速度很快.

sentences.en: There are three characteristics - liberalization, internationalization and commercialization on such evolution.
sentences.cn: 自由化 、 国际化和商业化是近代女子服装演变的三个主要特点.

sentences.en: They had become the victims of commercialization, for their names acquired a market value.
sentences.cn: 他们成了商品化的受害者, 因为他们的名字具有了市场价值.

sentences.en: When experts cite possible harm from the commercialization of laser enrichment, they often point to Iran.
sentences.cn: 当专家引证激光浓缩商业化可能带来的危害时，他们经常指向伊朗。

words.tran_cn: 商业的；营利的；靠广告收入的
